home.meta_title: Half Sword | Medieval Combat Simulation Game Guide
home.meta_description: Dive into the world of Half Sword, a medieval combat simulation game with rich history, weaponry, and unique gameplay.
home.h1: Half Sword Game Guide and News
home.h2: Your Ultimate Guide to Medieval Combat Simulation
home.intro: Welcome to the world of Half Sword! This immersive medieval combat simulation game is based on historical accuracy, where players start as commoners and progress to become knights, experiencing brutal duels of the 15th-century Europe.

features.title: Game Features
features.weapons: Realistic Weapons and Armor: The game offers historically accurate weapons and armor, allowing players to dive deep into a rich medieval world and experience diverse, distinctive equipment.
features.combat: Innovative Combat Mechanics: Players control their weapons precisely through mouse movements, feeling the tension of every collision. All animations and actions are meticulously designed for realistic combat.
features.hema: HEMA-based Combat System: The combat system is based on feedback from European Historical Martial Arts (HEMA) practitioners and swordfighters, enabling players to experience the intricacies of swordsmanship.

gameplay.title: Gameplay
gameplay.description: In Half Sword, players participate in various duels and tournaments, defeating opponents and earning the title of arena champion. As your rank increases, you'll face more formidable enemies and improve your battle tactics and strategies.

tips.title: Tips and Strategy
tips.weapon: Master Weapon Control: Use mouse movements to control the sword, mastering different weapons' characteristics to find the fighting style that suits you best.
tips.armor: Utilize Armor Advantages: With a variety of armor types available, choosing the right one based on battle needs will greatly enhance your survivability.
tips.strategy: Strategic Attacks and Defense: Observe your enemy's movements and strike at the right time while also defending to avoid critical damage.

news.title: Latest News
news.demo: Half Sword is currently available as a demo on Steam and is scheduled for full release in 2025. Visit the Steam store page for more details and add it to your wish list for notifications upon release.

community.title: Community
community.description: Join the official Discord community to connect with other players, share experiences, and stay updated on the latest game news and updates.
community.conclusion: With this guide, you can dive deeper into Half Sword and gain an edge in your medieval combat adventures!
